basics.name: GOPI KRISHNA GAJAM
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience building and deploying production-grade full-stack systems and AI-powered features using Node.js, Django, PostgreSQL, and cloud platforms. Proven ability to integrate LLMs, build retrieval-augmented systems, design secure APIs, and ship scalable applications with strong focus on performance, reliability, and real-world usability.

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
experience.description: Startup building web/mobile products and backend platforms with end-to-end ownership across APIs, data models, cloud deployment, CI/CD, and monitoring. Built and deployed 3 production applications using Node.js, Django, PostgreSQL, and React Native, delivering 100+ REST APIs and designing 20+ database schemas. Implemented cloud infrastructure on AWS using Docker + Kubernetes, integrating EC2, RDS, and S3 with auto-scaling. Developed secure auth and multi-tenant access controls, and owned performance improvements for WebSocket messaging and caching.

projects.title: GhostWriter – AI-Powered Content Generation Platform
projects.description: Built an AI-powered content generation system using large language models to generate structured long-form text based on user-defined prompts and constraints. Designed prompt templates and control strategies to guide tone, structure, and output consistency, reducing hallucinations and improving coherence. Implemented evaluation workflows to iteratively refine prompts and demonstrated an end-to-end AI pipeline.

projects.title: Vakalat – Multi-tenant Law Firm Management SaaS Platform
projects.description: Architected a multi-tenant SaaS platform with JWT authentication and role-based access control supporting law firms with case tracking, client management, and document handling. Designed database schemas and built a RESTful API with 50+ endpoints handling India-specific legal workflows. Designed backend services to support future RAG-based legal knowledge retrieval.

projects.title: StudyBuddy - Collaborative Learning Platform
projects.description: Built a real-time collaboration platform with study groups, subject-based filtering, and membership management using Django. Implemented real-time threaded messaging with live updates via WebSockets. Extended the platform with AI-powered study assistance for automated topic summaries and discussion insights.
